item.title: 2025 年比特币大崩盘使其落后于债券、黄金和其他货币
item.description: 这种曾被寄予 "登月 "厚望的资产正奋力追赶国债。比特币已从2025年的峰值下跌了近30%，落后于从科技股到国债的所有产品。【原文：The asset once expected to “go to the moon” is struggling to keep pace with Treasuries. Bitcoin has fallen nearly 30% from its 2025 peak, lagging behind everything from tech stocks to T-bills.】

item.title: 美联储 12 月会议的不确定因素
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: Meta 首席营收官在广泛的领导层调整中离职
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc.首席营收官约翰-黑格曼（John Hegeman）将离开这家社交网络领导者，这是这家公司在实施耗资巨大的人工智能战略的压力下进行的数次领导层变动之一。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. Chief Revenue Officer John Hegeman is leaving the social networking leader, one of several leadership changes at a company under pressure to deliver on a costly AI strategy.】

item.title: 南非顶级银行家看好利好消息狂潮
item.description: 在一连串利好消息的刺激下，南非的顶级银行家们对国家的经济前景表现出了几十年来最乐观的态度。【原文：Top South African bankers are the most optimistic they’ve been about the nation’s economic prospects in decades following a spate of good news.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚经济超出预期，实现 2022 年以来最快增长
item.description: 哥伦比亚的经济超过了所有预测，取得了自 19 世纪科维德大流行病以来最快的增长速度，这增加了中央银行可能需要开始提高利率的可能性。【原文：Colombia’s economy beat all forecasts with the fastest growth since the aftermath of the Covid-19 pandemic, boosting the chances that the central bank may need to start raising interest rates.】

item.title: 俄罗斯 Rostec 公司称战争产出飙升弥补了出口损失
item.description: 俄罗斯国防企业集团俄罗斯国家技术公司（Rostec State Corp.【原文：Russian defense conglomerate Rostec State Corp.’s soaring production for the military is helping compensate for a plunge in exports amid international sanctions, its chief executive officer said Tuesday.】

item.title: 谷歌推出新的双子座人工智能模型，提供交互式答案
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司首次发布了其人工智能模型 "双子座"（Gemini）的升级版，公司高管称，该模型在推理和编码能力方面实现了 "巨大飞跃"。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google debuted an updated version of its artificial intelligence model, Gemini, that executives said represents a “massive jump” in reasoning and coding ability.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Lovable 年化销售额达 2 亿美元，将进行新一轮融资
item.description: 瑞典人工智能编码初创公司 Lovable 表示，该公司的年经常性收入已达到 2 亿美元，这是公司快速增长的一个标志，使该公司能够在上一轮融资后不到五个月的时间里进行融资。【原文：Lovable, a Swedish artificial intelligence coding startup, said it has reached $200 million in annual recurring revenue, a sign of rapid growth that’s allowing the company to raise funds less than five months after its last round.】

item.title: 里士满联储主席巴尔金认为劳动力市场值得警惕
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长汤姆-巴金（Tom Barkin）对通胀前景持乐观态度，同时表示劳动力市场可能比现有数据显示的要弱。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Tom Barkin offered an optimistic inflation outlook, while suggesting the labor market may be weaker than available data signal.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司与 Munis 签订价值 5.22 亿美元的休斯顿机场协议
item.description: 今年，美国联合航空公司（United Airlines Inc.【原文：United Airlines Inc. is coming to the municipal bond market with a nearly $522 million junk deal in a year when investors have been rewarded for snapping up high-yield airline debt.】

item.title: 特朗普插手阿根廷事务，对冲基金收获暴利
item.description: 最近几个月在阿根廷下了大赌注的对冲基金在美国救援计划和哈维尔-米莱伊总统的政党在中期选举中大获全胜之后，在 10 月份取得了丰厚的收益，引发了阿根廷金融市场的大涨。【原文：Hedge funds that wagered big on Argentina in recent months notched bumper gains in October after a US rescue package and a resounding win for President Javier Milei’s party in midterm elections sparked a surge in the nation’s financial markets.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利复杂的比特币赌局在暴跌中吸引了 1.04 亿美元资金
item.description: 随着数字资产价格的解体，摩根士丹利吸引了富裕客户对一种与比特币挂钩的复杂新产品的大量需求。【原文：As digital-asset prices unravel, Morgan Stanley has drawn outsized demand from wealthy clients for a complex, new Bitcoin-linked product.】

item.title: 微软和 Nvidia 将向 Anthropic 投资 150 亿美元
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）和英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）承诺向Anthropic PBC合计投资150亿美元，此举拉近了这家人工智能开发商与其竞争对手OpenAI的两大支持者之间的距离。【原文：Microsoft Corp. and Nvidia Corp. are committing to invest up to a combined $15 billion in Anthropic PBC, in a move that ties the AI developer closer to two of the biggest backers for its rival OpenAI.】

item.title: 欧洲央行职位争夺战因欧元区财政部长离职而受挫
item.description: 欧元集团最高层出人意料地出现了一个空缺，这让本已复杂的在未来两年内更换欧洲央行三分之二高层的工作变得更加棘手。【原文：An unexpected vacancy at the top of the Eurogroup is scrambling the already complex task of replacing two thirds of the European Central Bank’s upper echelon over the next two years.】

item.title: 英国央行行长皮尔称英国总体通胀率夸大了物价压力
item.description: 英国央行首席经济学家休-皮尔（Huw Pill）表示，英国的物价压力并不像总体通胀预估值所显示的那样强劲，但他同时表示，政策制定者暂时不应再次降息。【原文：Bank of England Chief Economist Huw Pill said that UK price pressures are not as strong as headline inflation estimates suggest, though signaled policymakers should not cut interest rates again just yet.】

item.title: 雷诺与吉利合作后在巴西投资 7.14 亿美元
item.description: 雷诺汽车公司和中国吉利汽车公司决定联手在巴西投资 38 亿雷亚尔（约合 7.14 亿美元），共同开发新车型，以更好地参与南美最大汽车市场的竞争。【原文：Renault SA and China’s Geely are investing 3.8 billion reais ($714 million) in Brazil to develop new models together after the two automakers decided to join forces to better compete in South America’s largest car market.】

item.title: 押注关税退还如何成为热门新行业
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的大部分关税是否违法？美国最高法院正在审理的这一问题在华尔街催生了一种新的热门交易。金融公司正在购买美国进口商支付的关税退款权，期望法院能驳回征税，为公司获得退款创造条件。【原文：Are the bulk of President Donald Trump’s tariffs unlawful? That question, now before the US Supreme Court, has spawned a hot new trade on Wall Street. Financial firms are buying the rights to refunds on tariffs paid by US importers on the expectation that the court will strike down the levies and set the stage for companies to be reimbursed.】

item.title: Alphabet 领导的人工智能项目将保护新西兰电网免受停电影响
item.description: 由服务于新西兰四分之一国土的四家公用事业公司组成的财团将加入 Alphabet 公司领导的一项计划，利用人工智能来加固该国的电网，防止极端天气或地震造成的故障。【原文：A consortium of four utilities serving a quarter of New Zealand will join an Alphabet Inc.-led initiative that uses artificial intelligence to fortify the country’s grid against failures caused by extreme weather or earthquakes.】

item.title: 尽管降价幅度创历史新高，但美国住宅建筑商的信心仍勉强上升
item.description: 本月，美国住宅建筑商的信心几乎没有上升，因为他们难以用昂贵的销售激励措施吸引谨慎的购房者离场。【原文：US homebuilders’ confidence barely rose this month as they struggled to lure cautious buyers off the sidelines with costly sales incentives.】

item.title: 智利总统热门人选卡斯特签约顶级经济顾问
item.description: 智利总统候选人何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特（José Antonio Kast）启用了一大批曾与较为温和的竞争对手共事过的知名经济学家，为他的竞选活动注入了对投资者友好的重要推动力。【原文：Chile presidential candidate José Antonio Kast tapped a slew of high-profile economists who had worked with a more moderate rival, giving his campaign a crucial, investor-friendly boost.】

item.title: 爱尔兰西蒙-哈里斯将出任财政部长
item.description: 周二上午，帕夏尔-多诺霍（Paschal Donohoe）突然辞职，副总理兼现任外交部长西蒙-哈里斯（Simon Harris）将成为爱尔兰下一任财政部长。【原文：Simon Harris, deputy premier and current foreign minister, will become Ireland’s next finance minister after the surprise resignation of Paschal Donohoe Tuesday morning.】

item.title: 汇丰银行将向美国和阿联酋客户提供代币化存款
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）将于明年上半年开始向其在美国和阿拉伯联合酋长国的企业客户提供代币化存款，这也是银行扩大区块链技术在支付领域应用的举措。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc will start offering tokenized deposits to its corporate clients in the US and the United Arab Emirates in the first half of next year, as banks expand their push into blockchain technology for payments.】

item.title: 马歇尔-韦斯将向投资者返还 31 亿美元以抑制增长
item.description: 马歇尔-韦斯（Marshall Wace）正准备将其两项主要对冲基金策略中的数十亿美元返还给投资者，与其他同行一道放弃现金以控制资产增长。【原文：Marshall Wace is preparing to hand back billions of dollars to investors from two of its main hedge fund strategies, joining peers in spurning cash to keep asset growth in check.】

item.title: 据说 Ardian 将利用摩根士丹利和麦格理退出 GBA
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Ardian SAS 已选择摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）和麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）帮助安排德国实验室服务供应商 GBA 集团的潜在出售事宜，该交易价值约为 15 亿欧元（17 亿美元）。【原文：Ardian SAS has selected Morgan Stanley and Macquarie Group Ltd. to help arrange a potential sale of German laboratory services provider GBA Group, which could be worth about €1.5 billion ($1.7 billion) in a deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 意大利努力为濒临倒闭的南部钢铁厂寻找买家
item.description: 意大利政府正在努力争取投资者的介入，以拯救该国最大的钢铁制造商，该公司在经历了多年亏损和政治挫折后，前景日益暗淡。【原文：Italy’s government is seeking to woo investors to step in and save the country’s biggest steelmaker, which faces narrowing prospects after years of losses and political setbacks.】

item.title: 法国警方在与阿尔托莉斯有关的腐败调查中实施突袭
item.description: 作为正在进行的涉及亿万富翁帕特里克-德拉希（Patrick Drahi）的电信集团 Altice 的腐败调查的一部分，警方周二在法国各地进行了突袭。【原文：Police carried out raids across France on Tuesday as part of the ongoing corruption probe involving billionaire Patrick Drahi’s telecommunications group Altice.】

item.title: Ocado 因最大客户撤出仓库技术而下滑
item.description: Ocado Group Plc 的最大客户、美国杂货商克罗格公司（Kroger Co.【原文：Ocado Group Plc’s shares slumped after its biggest customer, US grocer Kroger Co., said its automated warehouse network is falling short of financial expectations and announced the closure of three sites.】

item.title: 位于得克萨斯州的卡塔尔-埃克森液化天然气工厂计划于二月首次发货
item.description: 卡塔尔能源公司（QatarEnergy）和埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp）在得克萨斯州的合资企业计划在二月份装载第一批液化天然气货物，这将是美国出口液化天然气燃料的一个重要里程碑。【原文：The Texas joint venture between QatarEnergy and Exxon Mobil Corp. is targeting February to load its first liquefied natural gas cargo, in what would be a major milestone for US exports of the fuel.】

item.title: 黄金矿商陷入困境，艾略特大举入股巴里克公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management LP）已持有巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp.【原文：Activist investor Elliott Investment Management LP has taken a large stake in Barrick Mining Corp., according to people familiar with the matter, after operational problems and cost blowouts left the gold producer trailing its peers while bullion prices surged.】

item.title: 纳米比亚可能无法从南非降低通胀目标中充分受益
item.description: 纳米比亚央行表示，如果无法控制工资制定者以及水电价格，可能无法从南非降低通胀目标中获得全部收益。【原文：Namibia’s central bank said it may not reap the full gains from South Africa’s lower inflation target if it is unable to rein in wage-setters and water and electricity prices.】
